name: Super Spartan Bros.
description:
You control 10 Spartans!
  • Raise your shields to block incoming arrows. Lower your shields to block enemies with swords as well as attack with your spears!
  • You can't attack while your shields are up.
  • You can't turn around while your shields are down.
  • Be careful.
Blue = Move | Yellow = Raise Shields | Red = Attack Game not loading?

If you are using the Brave browser, you have to disable shields:

Leaderboard powered by LootLocker.io

LootLocker is a powerful service that is easy to use and has a great free tier which I used for this game! I learned how to use it quickly by watching this tutorial by Zyger on YouTube!
